    TournamentSelector.population
    It is the population object within the genetic algorithm.

    Description
    static Chromosome[]
    Crossover.generateOffsprings(Chromosome[] parents)
    Generates an array of offspring based on an even array of parents.
    Chromosome[]
    ParentSelector.getWinners(int numOfWinners)
    This method runs the tournament selector algorithm a number of times to get a specified number of winners.

    PopulationInitializer.populate(int amount)
    A method which takes the number of individuals in the population and creates that many chromosomes.

    Method
    Description
    static void
    PopulationInitializer.addGuidedGene(Chromosome chromosome)
    This method adds a single gene to the specified chromosome, which is taken from the user's liked aliments list (App.likes).

    PopulationInitializer.addRandomGene(Chromosome chromosome)
    This method adds a single random gene to the specified chromosome.

    A method which gets the variations of all the constraints.
    static Chromosome[]
    Crossover.generateOffsprings(Chromosome[] parents)
    Generates an array of offspring based on an even array of parents.
    static void
    Mutator.mutate(Chromosome[] genotype)
    This method iterates through each chromosome of a population and mutates them with a probability of MUTATION_PROBABILITY
    void
    SurvivorSelector.replace(Chromosome[] offSprings)
    This method takes an array of offspring and runs the tournament selector algorithm on the population to find the weakest chromosomes.
    void
    Chromosome.setEqualTo(Chromosome otherChromosome)
    Sets the chromosome map of this object to another.

    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    ParentSelector(Chromosome[] population, int k)
    Constructor for the ParentSelector class which takes in the population object and K (the number of selected solutions each round) to implement the tournament selector.
     
    SurvivorSelector(Chromosome[] population, int k)
    Constructor for the SurvivorSelector class which takes in the population object and K (the number of selected solutions each round) to implement the tournament selector.
     
    TournamentSelector(Chromosome[] population, int k)
    The constructor of the TournamentSelector algorithm, which is called by the subclasses.
